name: INSendPaymentIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for transferring money from the current user’s account to a different user’s account.

items.name: func resolvePayee(for: INSendPaymentIntent, with: (INSendPaymentPayeeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the recipient for a payment.

items.name: func resolveCurrencyAmount(for: INSendPaymentIntent, with: (INSendPaymentCurrencyAmountResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the amount of currency to transfer.

items.name: func resolveNote(for: INSendPaymentIntent, with: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the notes associated with the transaction.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSendPaymentIntent, completion: (INSendPaymentIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles transferring the money between accounts.
